response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000, which we believe is a remarkable deal considering its true worth of $1,500,000. We are confident that you will find this offer irresistible and hope to hear your positive response soon. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
